title: Loudon Wainwright III on Tokyo Story
itunes:title: Loudon Wainwright III on Tokyo Story
description:
Loudon Wainwright III is a Grammy-winning singer and songwriter, as well as a part-time actor. Loudon was kind enough to sit with Chuck backstage before a performance to talk about music, movies, family, life and what is was like in San Francisco in the Summer of '68. Listen in as they crush on the deeply meditative Japanese film from 1953, Tokyo Story. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
